JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description        As an Associate Senior Software Engineer, you will analyze, design, code, debug, test, and modify new software or enhancements while considering software abilities. In this role, you will create strategic technical designs for small scope projects within the team.        Your responsibilities also include providing high-level architecture guidance and developing specifications to resolve software problems.        As an Associate Senior Software, you will debug complicated issues that span around multiple modules, deploy and monitor applications, propose and lead process improvements projects for development.        In this role, you will consult with stakeholders on the current functionality and complexity of adding features, estimate effort for current and future projects.       Additionally, you will share knowledge within the team through mentoring, coaching, technical talks, and blogs.            Basic Qualifications :            Bachelor s Degree in Engineering with Computer Science, Information Systems or related field, or equivalent work experience         At least 3 years of development work experience using SQL         At least 3 years of work experience in Python

EDUCATION.UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial
